entry.title: Python code for earthquake source parameter calculation---SAES is released
entry.content:
We just released an open source package for earthquake source parameter calculation:
https://github.com/Johumel/SAES
,which implements both single spectral and spectral ratio method to calculate source parameters. Figures with publication quality also generated.

entry.title: Trip to La Malbaie to repair McGill Charlevoix seismic stations with John O.
New paper submitted to JGR!
entry.content: Our numerical modelling paper titled as “Earthquake rupture through a step-over fault system: A case study of the Leech River Fault, southern Vancouver Island” has been submitted to JGR:Solid Earth.

entry.title: Talk in CGU
entry.content: I give an oral presentation about our research on the Leech River fault zone(LRFZ) during Canadian Geophysical Union(CGU) held in Vancouver, May 2017.

entry.title: CGU Outstanding Student Paper Award
entry.content: I win the 2017 CGU Chevron Canada Outstanding Student Paper in Seismology! Take a look at my conference paper!

entry.title: New paper published in JGR
entry.content: Our paper on the Leech River fault zone(LRFZ) is publised online in JGR today! G. Li, Y. Liu, C. Regalla, and K.D. Morell, Seismicity relocation and fault structure near the Leech River Fault Zone, southern Vancouver Island.

entry.title: New paper on induced seismicity published in JGR
entry.content: Paper on the source parameters of fluid induced seismicity in WCSB area is published online. H. Zhang, D.W. Eaton, G. Li, Y. Liu and R.M. Harrington,Discriminating induced seismicity from natural earthquakes using moment tensors and source spectra.
